title: Study for Maximum Mass Permitted by the 1916 New York Zoning Law, Stage 3
medium: Black crayon, stumped and erased; brush and black wash over photostat, varnish, on illustration board
description: Rendering of very dark, monumental high-rise building complex with tall set back central tower, flanked by two shorter towers, each with setback upper stories that form a pyramid-shaped tops.  Background shaded with cross-hatching to create a halo effect behind the building complex in the foreground.
name: Drawing
